title: What do you think of the drumming style of Bill Ward from Black Sabbath? - Quora

response.answer_text: Brilliant. Chaotic, jazzy. It’s very light and organic and at the same time heavy and doom laden as fuck. A drummer who should be more adulated. Everyone is obsessed by one particular classic rock drummer but there are far more groovy and interesting motherfuckers and Bill Ward is one of them.
Perfect for the style of music Black Sabbath helped innovate. He wasn’t a complex drummer yet the progenitor to the hard hitting Heavy Metal drumming.
